name: net-ui
description: A UI Component Library with Vue.js

scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js,.vue src docs build --ignore-pattern src/stylesheet test/unit/specs test/e2e/specs
scripts.dist: npm run build:locale && npm run build:component && npm run build:doc
scripts.prepublish: npm run build:locale && npm run build:component

author: Koppt Ho <kopptsoft@gmail.com>
